roleset.name: fill to capacity

example.name: agent and substance merged
example.text: As hamburger and pizza outlets saturate one area after another, franchisers are struggling desperately for market share, slashing prices and stepping up costly promotions.

example.name: no substance mentioned
example.text: But low-priced and middle-priced furriers like Mr. Purnick, who [] once saturated the five-block Seventh Avenue fur district, say imports have cut their sales.
example.arg: the five-block Seventh Avenue fur district,

example.name: no agent mentioned
example.text: The day was saturated [*]with the weight of its own impending history.
example.arg: [*]with the weight of its own impending history.

example.name: Arg1,2
example.text: While most people think of diamonds as colorless, a segment of the diamond market is prized for its saturation of color.

roleset.note: SATURATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls fill-9.8 (from saturate.01-v)
If it seems like a substance, but has any sort of volition, we appear to be marking it at arg0. (from saturate.01-v)
